scripts.build: parcel build src\html-acca\*.html --public-url='./' --out-dir='build/acca' && parcel build src\html-digital\*.html --public-url='./' --out-dir='build/digital-programme' && parcel build src\html-openday\*.html --public-url='./' --out-dir='build/open-day' && parcel build src\html-scholarship\*.html --public-url='./' --out-dir='build/scholarship' && parcel build src\html-udemy\*.html --public-url='./' --out-dir='build/short-courses' && parcel build src\html-social\*.html --public-url='./' --out-dir='build/social-work'
